description: Detects a suspicious or uncommon parent processes of PowerShell
author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov
Harish Segar
name: Suspicious PowerShell Parent Process
query: (((process.parent.executable.text:"*tomcat*") OR (process.parent.executable.text:("*\\amigo.exe" OR "*\\browser.exe" OR "*\\chrome.exe" OR "*\\firefox.exe" OR "*\\httpd.exe" OR "*\\iexplore.exe" OR "*\\jbosssvc.exe" OR "*\\microsoftedge.exe" OR "*\\microsoftedgecp.exe" OR "*\\MicrosoftEdgeSH.exe" OR "*\\mshta.exe" OR "*\\nginx.exe" OR "*\\outlook.exe" OR "*\\php\-cgi.exe" OR "*\\regsvr32.exe" OR "*\\rundll32.exe" OR "*\\safari.exe" OR "*\\services.exe" OR "*\\sqlagent.exe" OR "*\\sqlserver.exe" OR "*\\sqlservr.exe" OR "*\\vivaldi.exe" OR "*\\w3wp.exe"))) AND ((process.executable.text:("*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe")) OR (process.command_line.text:("*\/c\ powershell*" OR "*\/c\ pwsh*")) OR (winlog.event_data.Description:"Windows PowerShell") OR (Product:"PowerShell Core 6") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll"))))
